full_summary:
### CBSA - Upgrade Access Control System #### Supply Arrangement (SA) - Request for Proposal **Reference:** 1000408175
**Publication Date:** 2022-09-29
**Closing Date:** 2022-12-09 at 14:00:00 EST
**GSIN Classification:** N6350 (Alarm, Signal, and Security Detection Systems) ### Background The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking proposals for the upgrade of an existing access control system at 6900 Airport Road, Mississauga, Ontario. The selected supplier will be required to provide all necessary labor, equipment, materials, and supervision to install, program, test, and train the upgraded system. ### Contract Details The contract duration is from contract award to March 31, 2023. The anticipated start date is To Be Determined (TBD), and the estimated delivery date is March 31, 2023. ### Tendering Procedure This requirement is open only to those pre-qualified against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-200ACS in the Ontario Region. The following suppliers have been invited to submit a proposal: * 360 ASCAD * Chubb * ComNet * Convergint * Delco * Dimensional Tech * Fitch * Neuron Comm * Next Technology * Paladin * PV Services * Securmax * The Dekker Group * Tyco * Unified * Gunnebo * Stanley Black & Decker ### Security Requirements Common PS SRCL #02 applies. The designated organization screening (DOS) and enhanced reliability (ER) security requirements must be met. ### Inquiries and Proposals Inquiries regarding this Request for Proposal (RFP) requirement must be submitted to Glenn Tucker, Contracting Authority, at [CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca](mailto:CBSA-ASFC_Solicitations-Demandes_de_soumissions@cbsa-asfc.gc.ca). RFP documents will be e-mailed directly from the Contracting Authority to the qualified Supply Arrangement Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement. ### Public Procurement Information The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language. ### Anticipated Contract Start Date: TBD ### Estimated Contract End Date:
